verses.verse: וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> an altar עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <S%H7848><s%> [of] shittim חָמֵשׁ֩ <S%H2568><s%> five אַמּ֨וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits אֹ֜רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> long וְחָמֵ֧שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five אַמּ֣וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits רֹ֗חַב <S%H7341><s%> broad רָב֤וּעַ <S%H7251><s%> shall be foursquare יִהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> the altar וְשָׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> thereof [shall be] three אַמּ֖וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits קֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6967><s%> and the height

וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make קַרְנֹתָ֗יו <S%H7161><s%> the horns עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> on אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> of it upon the four פִּנֹּתָ֔יו <S%H6438><s%> corners מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at תִּהְיֶ֣יןָ <S%H1961><s%> become קַרְנֹתָ֑יו <S%H7161><s%> thereof his horns וְצִפִּיתָ֥ <S%H6823><s%> shall be of the same and thou shalt overlay אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> it with brass

וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make סִּֽירֹתָיו֙ <S%H5518><s%> his pans לְדַשְּׁנ֔וֹ <S%H1878><s%> to receive his ashes וְיָעָיו֙ <S%H3257><s%> and his shovels וּמִזְרְקֹתָ֔יו <S%H4219><s%> and his basons וּמִזְלְגֹתָ֖יו <S%H4207><s%> and his fleshhooks וּמַחְתֹּתָ֑יו <S%H4289><s%> and his firepans לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כֵּלָ֖יו <S%H3627><s%> all the vessels תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> thereof thou shalt make נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> [of] brass

וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make לּוֹ֙ מִכְבָּ֔ר <S%H4345><s%> for it a grate מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H4639><s%> of network רֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H7568><s%> and upon the net נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> [of] brass וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> shalt thou make עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on הָרֶ֗שֶׁת <S%H7568><s%> the net אַרְבַּע֙ <S%H702><s%> four טַבְּעֹ֣ת <S%H2885><s%> rings נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> brasen עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and אַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> in the four קְצוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H7098><s%> corners

וְנָתַתָּ֣ה <S%H5414><s%> And thou shalt put אֹתָ֗הּ <S%H853><s%> תַּ֛חַת <S%H8478><s%> beneath כַּרְכֹּ֥ב <S%H3749><s%> it under the compass הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar מִלְּמָ֑טָּה <S%H4295><s%> beneath וְהָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will reach הָרֶ֔שֶׁת <S%H7568><s%> that the net עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> may be even to חֲצִ֥י <S%H2677><s%> the midst הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar

וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make בַדִּים֙ <S%H905><s%> staves לַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> for the altar בַּדֵּ֖י <S%H905><s%> staves עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <S%H7848><s%> [of] shittim וְצִפִּיתָ֥ <S%H6823><s%> and overlay אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> them with brass

וְהוּבָ֥א <S%H935><s%> shall be put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בַּדָּ֖יו <S%H905><s%> And the staves בַּטַּבָּעֹ֑ת <S%H2885><s%> into the rings וְהָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become הַבַּדִּ֗ים <S%H905><s%> and the staves עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon שְׁתֵּ֛י <S%H8147><s%> shall be upon the two צַלְעֹ֥ת <S%H6763><s%> sides הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar בִּשְׂאֵ֥ת <S%H5375><s%> to bear אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

נְב֥וּב <S%H5014><s%> Hollow לֻחֹ֖ת <S%H3871><s%> with boards תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> shalt thou make אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> it הֶרְאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> it as it was shewed אֹתְךָ֛ <S%H853><s%> בָּהָ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> thee in the mount כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> so יַעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> so shall they make ס

וְעָשִׂ֕יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt make אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> חֲצַ֣ר <S%H2691><s%> the court הַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle לִפְאַ֣ת <S%H6285><s%> side נֶֽגֶב־ <S%H5045><s%> for the south תֵּ֠ימָנָה <S%H8486><s%> southward קְלָעִ֨ים <S%H7050><s%> [there shall be] hangings לֶחָצֵ֜ר <S%H2691><s%> for the court שֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8336><s%> linen מָשְׁזָ֗ר <S%H7806><s%> [of] fine twined מֵאָ֤ה <S%H3967><s%> of an hundred בָֽאַמָּה֙ <S%H520><s%> cubits אֹ֔רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> long לַפֵּאָ֖ה <S%H6285><s%> side הָאֶחָֽת׃ <S%H259><s%> for one

וְעַמֻּדָ֣יו <S%H5982><s%> pillars עֶשְׂרִ֔ים <S%H6242><s%> And the twenty וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H134><s%> sockets עֶשְׂרִ֖ים <S%H6242><s%> thereof and their twenty נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> [shall be of] brass וָוֵ֧י <S%H2053><s%> the hooks הָעַמֻּדִ֛ים <S%H5982><s%> of the pillars וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H2838><s%> and their fillets כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> [shall be of] silver

וְכֵ֨ן <S%H3651><s%> Likewise לִפְאַ֤ת <S%H6285><s%> side צָפוֹן֙ <S%H6828><s%> And likewise for the north בָּאֹ֔רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> in length קְלָעִ֖ים <S%H7050><s%> [there shall be] hangings מֵ֣אָה <S%H3967><s%> of an hundred אֹ֑רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> [cubits] long [וְעַמְדּוּ כ] (וְעַמּוּדָ֣יו <S%H5982><s%> pillars ק) עֶשְׂרִ֗ים <S%H6242><s%> and his twenty וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֤ם <S%H134><s%> sockets עֶשְׂרִים֙ <S%H6242><s%> and their twenty נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> [of] brass וָוֵ֧י <S%H2053><s%> the hooks הָֽעַמֻּדִ֛ים <S%H5982><s%> pillars וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H2838><s%> and their fillets כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> [of] silver

וְרֹ֤חַב <S%H7341><s%> And [for] the breadth הֶֽחָצֵר֙ <S%H2691><s%> of the court לִפְאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> side יָ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> on the west קְלָעִ֖ים <S%H7050><s%> [shall be] hangings חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> of fifty אַמָּ֑ה <S%H520><s%> cubits עַמֻּדֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5982><s%> their pillars עֲשָׂרָ֔ה <S%H6235><s%> ten וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H134><s%> and their sockets עֲשָׂרָֽה׃ <S%H6235><s%> ten

וְרֹ֣חַב <S%H7341><s%> And the breadth הֶֽחָצֵ֗ר <S%H2691><s%> of the court לִפְאַ֛ת <S%H6285><s%> side קֵ֥דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> on the east מִזְרָ֖חָה <S%H4217><s%> eastward חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> [shall be] fifty אַמָּֽה׃ <S%H520><s%> cubits

וַחֲמֵ֨שׁ <S%H2568><s%> fif עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <S%H6240><s%> teen אַמָּ֛ה <S%H520><s%> cubits קְלָעִ֖ים <S%H7050><s%> The hangings לַכָּתֵ֑ף <S%H3802><s%> of one side עַמֻּדֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5982><s%> their pillars שְׁלֹשָׁ֔ה <S%H7969><s%> three וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H134><s%> and their sockets שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7969><s%> three

וְלַכָּתֵף֙ <S%H3802><s%> side הַשֵּׁנִ֔ית <S%H8145><s%> And on the other חְמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> fif עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> teen קְלָעִ֑ים <S%H7050><s%> [shall be] hangings עַמֻּדֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5982><s%> [cubits] their pillars שְׁלֹשָׁ֔ה <S%H7969><s%> three וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H134><s%> and their sockets שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7969><s%> three

וּלְשַׁ֨עַר <S%H8179><s%> And for the gate הֶֽחָצֵ֜ר <S%H2691><s%> of the court מָסָ֣ךְ ׀ <S%H4539><s%> [shall be] an hanging עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> of twenty אַמָּ֗ה <S%H520><s%> cubits תְּכֵ֨לֶת <S%H8504><s%> [of] blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֜ן <S%H713><s%> and purple וְתוֹלַ֧עַת <S%H8438><s%> oppressor שָׁנִ֛י <S%H8144><s%> and scarlet וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8336><s%> linen מָשְׁזָ֖ר <S%H7806><s%> and fine twined מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> the work רֹקֵ֑ם <S%H7551><s%> of a weaver עַמֻּֽדֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5982><s%> [and] their pillars אַרְבָּעָ֔ה <S%H702><s%> [shall be] four וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H134><s%> and their sockets אַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <S%H702><s%> four

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All עַמּוּדֵ֨י <S%H5982><s%> All the pillars הֶֽחָצֵ֤ר <S%H2691><s%> the court סָבִיב֙ <S%H5439><s%> round about מְחֻשָּׁקִ֣ים <S%H2836><s%> [shall be] filleted כֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> with silver וָוֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H2053><s%> their hooks כָּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [shall be of] silver וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H134><s%> and their sockets נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> [of] brass

אֹ֣רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> The length הֶֽחָצֵר֩ <S%H2691><s%> of the court מֵאָ֨ה <S%H3967><s%> [shall be] an hundred בָֽאַמָּ֜ה <S%H520><s%> cubits וְרֹ֣חַב ׀ <S%H7341><s%> and the breadth חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> fifty בַּחֲמִשִּׁ֗ים <S%H2572><s%> every where וְקֹמָ֛ה <S%H6967><s%> and the height חָמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> five אַמּ֖וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits שֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8336><s%> linen מָשְׁזָ֑ר <S%H7806><s%> [of] fine twined וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H134><s%> and their sockets נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> [of] brass

לְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> All כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> All the vessels הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all עֲבֹדָת֑וֹ <S%H5656><s%> in all the service וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יְתֵדֹתָ֛יו <S%H3489><s%> thereof and all the pins וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִתְדֹ֥ת <S%H3489><s%> thereof and all the pins הֶחָצֵ֖ר <S%H2691><s%> of the court נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> [shall be of] brass ס

וְאַתָּ֞ה <S%H859><s%> You תְּצַוֶּ֣ה ׀ <S%H6680><s%> And thou shalt command אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְיִקְח֨וּ <S%H3947><s%> that they bring אֵלֶ֜יךָ <S%H413><s%> about שֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil זַ֥יִת <S%H2132><s%> olive זָ֛ךְ <S%H2134><s%> thee pure כָּתִ֖ית <S%H3795><s%> beaten לַמָּא֑וֹר <S%H3974><s%> for the light לְהַעֲלֹ֥ת <S%H5927><s%> to burn נֵ֖ר <S%H5216><s%> to cause the lamp תָּמִֽיד׃ <S%H8548><s%> always

בְּאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> In the tabernacle מוֹעֵד֩ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation מִח֨וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without לַפָּרֹ֜כֶת <S%H6532><s%> the vail אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is before הָעֵדֻ֗ת <S%H5715><s%> which [is] before the testimony יַעֲרֹךְ֩ <S%H6186><s%> shall order אֹת֨וֹ <S%H853><s%> אַהֲרֹ֧ן <S%H175><s%> Aaron וּבָנָ֛יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons מֵעֶ֥רֶב <S%H6153><s%> it from evening עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בֹּ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> to morning לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD חֻקַּ֤ת <S%H2708><s%> [it shall be] a statute עוֹלָם֙ <S%H5769><s%> for ever לְדֹ֣רֹתָ֔ם <S%H1755><s%> unto their generations מֵאֵ֖ת <S%H854><s%> for בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> on the behalf of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ס
